guide.title: Outdated CPAN Packages (perl-experimental vs CPAN)
guide.author: Script generated using up2date-ng version 0.24
guide.abstract: This document lists the packages suspected as outdated

body.p: This list is not exhaustive and may contain mistakes/errors. Accuracy is only guaranteed at 90% and is generated to inform developers about which CPAN modules are currently out of date in perl-experimental. Our most frequent bug request is for module bumping. This list is intended as acknowledgement (and hopefully will curb some of the bugs to boot).
Total packages suspected as outdated: 1 of 725
